public LightDefinition(LightType lightType, Vector3? position = null, Vector3? direction = null, Vector3? color = null, float intensity = 1, float range = 0, float spotAngle = 0)

Parameters

lightType LightType

The type of the light (Directional, Point, or Spot).

position Vector3?

The position of the light in world space.

direction Vector3?

The direction of the light in world space.

color Vector3?

The base color of the light as a Vector3.

intensity float

The brightness or intensity of the light.

range float

The range of the light.

spotAngle float

The angle of the spotlight cone in radians.
